name: Cat-cher
description:
Welcome to Cat-cher, a game where you run around catching cats and avoiding babies. Use arrow keys to move left and right, including jumping with up arrow. In normal mode, you can't let the cats hit the ground, but if you get hit by a stork or a baby, you will die. In easy mode, Cats can hit the ground, but if they hit spikes or leave the screen, you lose a heart. Babies and spikes still insta-kill you. If your score reaches 999900 (cats are 100 points each), you will get a special secret screen! That's about it! All music and sprites by me, and the font is Futile Pro by Eeve Somepx at somepx.itch.io. I hope you have fun, and although this game is free, I highly ask that you donate so that I can someday get a better pc to make better games. -Stygian Hero

Please note that windows version does not have "quick start" feature.
